text: Mohd Loqman Hakim bin Marzuki (born 22 January 1998) is Malaysian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Kedah. He was a alumni of Sultan Abdul Hamid College ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kedah Category:Malaysian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Kedah FA players Category:Malaysia Super League players
title: Loqman Hakim
